subject: Make message-app not dependent on ecore_x.
commitMessage:
Make message-app not dependent on ecore_x.

Change-Id: I087dd80919b2e1f62d1c1b9021d064baae636d3b
Signed-off-by: Leandro Dorileo <leandro.maciel.dorileo@intel.com>
Signed-off-by: Fabio Mello <fabio.mello@intel.com>

comments.message: Uploaded patch set 1.

Patch Set 1: Code-Review+1

Code is good to me. But there are still some blocks making this package build failed. 
The 1st one is ui-gadget-1, see https://bugs.tizen.org/jira/browse/PTREL-677 . With https://review.tizen.org/gerrit/#/c/15766/ , this issue can be fixed.
The other one is "Can't find Ethumb.h", this should be fixed by adding ethumb check. With https://review.tizen.org/gerrit/#/c/16257/, this issue can be fixed

Patch Set 1:

wu, https://review.tizen.org/gerrit/#/c/16257/ is broken. do you mean something else?
Uploaded patch set 2.
Patch Set 2: Code-Review+1

Patch Set 2:

Micheal, https://review.tizen.org/gerrit/#/c/16257/ is not broken, and is still under review.

subject: Add ethumb dependency check
commitMessage:
Add ethumb dependency check

This patch fix build issue.

Change-Id: I66fb6b21720246dd7283c3eaaaafa56c39d599c5
Signed-off-by: Alex Wu <zhiwen.wu@linux.intel.com>

comments.message: Uploaded patch set 1.

Patch Set 1:

(1 comment)

thanks, one small issue in "ecore-x" requirement, we'd better to make changes based on the previous changes, then we can avoid the rebase things.

Patch Set 1:

yes, we should cook another patch for conditionally introducing X dependency in spec file.

subject: Ecore_X: optionally compile win id get
commitMessage:
Ecore_X: optionally compile win id get

Optionally compile the win id getting for Ecore_X and wayland. The
wayland support was left unimplemented since we still must add
wayland API for service package.

Change-Id: I033d30460079c7119f6782e3a196d0937ba978b2
Signed-off-by: Leandro Dorileo <leandro.maciel.dorileo@intel.com>

comments.message: Uploaded patch set 1.
Patch Set 1: Code-Review+1
